summary: This is my own character preset for my Nord Character, that I have made for myself as I had to keep remaking  the character every time I added a mod that changed a lot of things.
descriptionHtml:
This is where I'll be placing my personal character presets that I decide to make over time, saving me the time from having to remake the characters each time.

The reason I'm backing this up on Nexus, not on Google Drive or DropBox is because I trust Nexus' reputations and I'd like to be able to download the presets straight to NMM as well as keeping the presets for use in future.

Installation //
NMM/Mod Organizer -
Just download it and click to install. It'll only add the preset/s, nothing more.

Manuel -
Move the .esps to Skyrim/Data and then on the launcher.

Uninstallation //
NMM/Mod Organizer -
Just uninstall. You do not need to have to clean your saves. It'll simply remove the presets.

Manuel -
Just remove the ESP.

The mods that are currently used/updated are:
Superior Lore Friendly Hair - HD Textures (2k) // http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510/?
Extended Slider Colors // http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6923/?
Beards // http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?
AOF Believable Hair -Female and Male- // http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4307/?
XCE - Xenius Character Enchancement // http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2356/?
XCE - Scarface // http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24600/?
Weathered Warpaint and Improved Dirt // http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4489/?
author: thingy123
